derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin exculpat- 'freed from blame', from the verb exculpare, from ex- 'out, from' + Latin culpa 'blame'

means.word_mean: 1. pronounce not guilty of criminal charges;

sentences.sentence: "The suspect was cleared of the murder charges"

in进入+culp错,罪+ate使……→使别人有罪
